# **Oil Heating System Inspection and Maintenance for Cape Breton Area**

## **Procurement Details**

### Publication Date: 2023-09-22

### Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-19T14:00:00

### Contract Reference Number: WS4224647584-Doc4224710860

### Procurement Category: Service

## **Scope of Work**

The Department of National Defence requires the provision of services for the inspection, maintenance, and emergency repairs to oil boilers/furnaces and distribution systems at the Cape Breton Detachment of CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. This work includes all necessary labour, equipment, tools, and supervision.

## **Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## **Regions of Opportunity**

The services will be delivered in the region of Nova Scotia.

## **Contracting Entity**

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence.

## **Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

Nicole Fesseha, PSPC
nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## **Notice**
